text: Kalladhina Min Qablikum Kanu 'Ashadda Minkum Quwatan Wa 'Akthara 'Amwalaan Wa 'Awladaan Fastamta`u Bikhalaqihim Fastamta`tum Bikhalaqikum Kama Astamta`a Al-Ladhina Min Qablikum Bikhalaqihim Wa Khuđtum Kalladhi Khađu 'Ula'ika Habitat 'A`maluhum Fi Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirati Wa 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Khasiruna
